metadata.Title: CVE-2020-10738 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in Moodle versions 3.8 before 3.8.3, 3.7 before 3.7.6, 3.6before 3.6.10, 3.5 before 3.5.12 and earlier unsupported versions. It waspossible to create a SCORM package in such a way that when added to acourse, it could be interacted with via web services in order to achieveremote code execution.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
